item.title: The easy way to synchronize your data.
item.description: Backing up data is a wise choice, but it can become a hassle for large amount of data. Here comes rsync. By reading this article, you will be able to synchronize and backup your data with rsync within one minute! What is rsync rsync stands for remote syncrhonization. It is a tool written in C language which lets you synchronize your data seemlessly through a large number of protocols.
